hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: A journey through code, creativity, and continuous learning

biography.title: About Me
biography.motto: May your love of learning be as boundless as the universe itself!
content: I'm Lance Javate, a web developer based in Cebu, Philippines, specializing in modern, responsive web applications focused on usability and performance. I work across both frontend and backend technologies, allowing me to deliver complete, well-structured solutions from concept to deployment.

I currently work as a Junior Web Developer at Kapwa Marketing, where I progressed from an intern to a full-time role. My experience includes building client-facing websites, implementing responsive designs, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver reliable, high-quality digital products.
I hold a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology from Cordova Public College, which provided a strong foundation in software development, web technologies, and modern programming practices.
I'm committed to continuous learning and staying up to date with industry trends. I'm always open to new projects, collaborations, and opportunities to create meaningful digital experiences.

events.title: Elementary School Begins
events.description: Started my educational journey at Cordova Central School, where I first discovered my interest in computers and technology.

events.title: High School Adventure
events.description: Entered Cordova Catholic Cooperative School for secondary education. This period sparked my deeper interest in technology and problem-solving.

events.title: First Programming Experience
events.description: Discovered my passion for programming through self-learning and online resources. Built my first simple applications and fell in love with coding.

events.title: College Journey Begins
events.description: Enrolled in Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at Cordova Public College. Started formal education in software development and web technologies.

events.title: First Web Project
events.description: Created my first full-stack web application, combining frontend and backend technologies. This project solidified my passion for web development.

events.title: Exploring Modern Frameworks
events.description: Dived deep into React and Vue.js, learning component-based architecture and modern JavaScript patterns. Built several projects to master these technologies.

events.title: AI Tools Integration
events.description: Started exploring AI-powered development tools and incorporating them into my workflow. Discovered how AI can enhance productivity and creativity in coding.

events.title: Web Development Intern
events.description: Joined Kapwa Marketing as a Web Development Intern. Gained real-world experience working on client projects and collaborating with a professional team.

events.title: Junior Web Developer
events.description: Promoted to Junior Web Developer at Kapwa Marketing. Taking on more responsibilities, leading projects, and continuing to grow as a developer.

events.title: Portfolio Website
events.description: Built this comprehensive portfolio website using Nuxt 3 and Vue.js, showcasing my projects, skills, and journey as a developer.

lifeOutsideWork.title: Life Outside Work
lifeOutsideWork.subtitle: What keeps me balanced and inspired

items.name: Coding
items.description: I love building web applications, exploring new technologies, and solving complex problems through elegant code solutions. Even outside work hours, I enjoy working on personal projects and contributing to open-source.

items.name: Music
items.description: Music is my constant companion. I mostly listen to pop, but I also enjoy hip-hop, R&B, and folk. My favorite artists are Taylor Swift, SZA, and Kendrick Lamar. Music helps me focus while coding and relax after a long day.

items.name: Gaming
items.description: I take interest in MOBA and RPG genres. I also play Tower Defense and Sandbox games. My favorite games are DOTA 2, BTD6, and Pokemon. Gaming helps me unwind and think strategically.

items.name: Fitness
items.description: I stay fit through regular exercise, maintaining my physical health, and building strength for a balanced lifestyle. A healthy body supports a healthy mind, especially important for long coding sessions.

items.name: Continuous Learning
items.description: I believe in never stopping to learn. Technology evolves rapidly, and staying curious and adaptable is key to growth as a developer.

items.name: Work-Life Balance
items.description: Maintaining a healthy balance between work and personal life is essential. It keeps me creative, motivated, and prevents burnout.

items.name: Community
items.description: I value collaboration and community. Sharing knowledge, helping others, and learning from peers makes the journey more meaningful.
